install.name: HD-CustomCSS
install.author: Hyde-Design
install.description: A simple Module to enable you to style individual pages with CSS.

param.name: customcss
param.label: Custom CSS
param.description: Replace with your inline custom CSS.

param.name: browsercss
param.label: Conditional Style
param.description: Select if you wish your CSS to be rendered on a specific browser only.

param.name: externalcss
param.label: Use an external CSS file?
param.description: Select if you prefer to load an external CSS file from the template's CSS folder.

param.name: externalcssfile
param.label: CSS URL
param.description: Type the full URL towards your external CSS file.
